snippet.title: Johnny Depp is Furious at Amber Heard for Speaking About Domestic Abuse | Splash News TV
snippet.description:
According to new reports, Johnny Depp is furious at Amber Heard for speaking out about domestic abuse. Now he has stonewalled payments in their $6.8 million divorce settlement. 

Subscribe now for the latest Daily Hollywood Celebrity Splash TV News: https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

Best Daily Splash News Daily Celebrity Playlist: https://goo.gl/QsxT0r

Johnny Depp is very upset at Amber Heard.

And we think this battle with continue to heat up.

Just the other day the actress came out against domestic abuse, say that as woman who has gone through it on the public stage, she has a unique opportunity to remind other women that it they don’t have to go at it alone.

Now reports claim Depp is arguing that she has broken the terms of their settlement.

You may remember, Depp agreed to pay Heard a 6.8 million dollar divorce settlement, and Amber said she would donate the proceeds to charity.

Apparently he and his legal eagles think she just breached the confidentiality agreement reached between them, and rumor has it he is stalling on fulfilling payment.

Amber has yet to respond to the story, and other than reports than Johnny is upset at the news, he hasn’t spoken out either.

Depp and Heard divorced after being married for 15 months.

tags: Johnny Depp mad at Amber Heard
